branding.name: Top 5 Vegan Recipes
branding.tagline: Plant-Powered Meals for a Healthier You

meta.title: Top 5 Vegan Recipes | Delicious Plant-Based Meals
meta.description: Explore our collection of easy, delicious vegan recipes. From quick weeknight dinners to impressive plant-based meals everyone will love.

recipes.title: Creamy Coconut Chickpea Curry
recipes.description: A warming, aromatic curry loaded with chickpeas and vegetables in a creamy coconut sauce. Ready in 30 minutes and perfect over rice.

instructions.instruction: Heat coconut oil in a large pot over medium heat. Sauté onion until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add garlic and ginger, cook for 1 minute until fragrant.
Stir in curry powder and garam masala, toast for 30 seconds.
Add diced tomatoes and coconut milk. Stir well and bring to a simmer.
Add chickpeas and simmer for 15 minutes until sauce thickens.
Stir in spinach until wilted. Season with salt to taste.
Serve over basmati rice and garnish with fresh cilantro.

tips: Add red pepper flakes for heat
Substitute sweet potatoes or cauliflower for chickpeas
Leftovers taste even better the next day

recipes.title: Mediterranean Quinoa Power Bowl
recipes.description: A vibrant bowl packed with quinoa, roasted vegetables, hummus, and a zesty lemon tahini dressing. Nutritious, filling, and full of Mediterranean flavors.

instructions.instruction: Cook quinoa according to package directions. Fluff and let cool slightly.
Roast chickpeas: toss with 1 tbsp olive oil, salt, and pepper. Roast at 400°F for 20-25 minutes until crispy.
instructions.tip: Shake the pan halfway through for even crispiness.

instructions.instruction: Make tahini dressing: whisk tahini, lemon juice, garlic, remaining olive oil, and 2 tbsp water until smooth.
Divide quinoa between bowls. Arrange cucumber, tomatoes, red onion, olives, and crispy chickpeas on top.
Add a scoop of hummus to each bowl. Drizzle with tahini dressing.
Garnish with fresh parsley and serve.

tips: Prep components separately for easy meal prep
The dressing keeps for a week refrigerated

recipes.title: Spicy Black Bean Tacos
recipes.description: Perfectly seasoned black beans with fresh pico de gallo, creamy avocado, and tangy lime crema. These tacos are so satisfying, no one will miss the meat.

instructions.instruction: Make pico de gallo: combine diced tomatoes, half the red onion, jalapeño, half the cilantro, juice of 1 lime, and salt. Set aside.
Make lime crema: mix cashew cream with juice of 1 lime and a pinch of salt.
Heat black beans in a pan with cumin, chili powder, garlic powder, and a splash of water. Mash slightly for texture.
instructions.tip: Leave some beans whole for varied texture.

instructions.instruction: Warm tortillas in a dry skillet or directly over a gas flame for char marks.
Assemble tacos: spiced black beans, pico de gallo, avocado slices, remaining onion and cilantro.
Drizzle with lime crema and serve with lime wedges.

tips: Char tortillas over a gas flame for authentic flavor
Add pickled red onions for extra tang
Use flour tortillas for a softer taco

recipes.title: Thai Peanut Noodle Stir-Fry
recipes.description: Chewy rice noodles tossed in a creamy peanut sauce with crispy tofu and colorful vegetables. This restaurant-quality dish is ready in 25 minutes.

instructions.instruction: Cook rice noodles according to package directions. Drain and rinse with cold water to prevent sticking.
Make peanut sauce: whisk peanut butter, soy sauce, rice vinegar, maple syrup, and 3 tbsp warm water until smooth.
Heat sesame oil in a large wok over high heat. Add tofu and fry until crispy on all sides, 5-6 minutes. Remove and set aside.
instructions.tip: Don't stir too often - let tofu get crispy.

instructions.instruction: In the same wok, stir-fry bell pepper and carrots for 2-3 minutes until crisp-tender.
Add garlic, cook 30 seconds. Add noodles and peanut sauce, toss to coat evenly.
Return tofu to wok, add green onions, and toss everything together.
Serve topped with crushed peanuts and lime wedges. Add sriracha for heat.

tips: Press tofu for at least 15 minutes for crispier results
Add more veggies: broccoli, snap peas, or cabbage
Use almond butter for a peanut-free version

recipes.title: Hearty Lentil Bolognese
recipes.description: A rich, meaty-textured bolognese made with lentils and mushrooms. This comfort classic is packed with protein and tastes even better than the original.

instructions.instruction: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add onion, carrots, and celery. Sauté for 8-10 minutes until softened.
instructions.tip: This is called soffritto - the flavor base of Italian cooking.

instructions.instruction: Add mushrooms and cook until they release their moisture and brown, about 5 minutes.
Add garlic and tomato paste, cook for 1 minute. Pour in wine if using, let it reduce by half.
Add lentils, crushed tomatoes, vegetable broth, and Italian seasoning. Stir well.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 25-30 minutes until lentils are tender.
While sauce simmers, cook spaghetti according to package directions. Drain, reserving 1 cup pasta water.
Season bolognese with salt and pepper. Thin with pasta water if needed. Serve over spaghetti with fresh basil.

tips: Use a food processor to quickly chop the mirepoix
Red wine adds depth but can be replaced with more broth
Freezes beautifully for up to 3 months
